values:
Hey,woah..Does anyone read this anymore?

Ash

I hate this journal..Screw you guys I'm using to myspace.

Ash

I don't want you to hate me,You should know you educate me.
You should know..you make me want to say..You're bitchin'.

I think Merry Christmas is a little over-rated..but..have a good one anyway.
I was kidding..I love him..:)of course.You'll never get what you want if you give up,so I figure I'll be an optimist because I want this more than anything.
Gosh..I am just now realizing that I have so much to hide.I'm so different from the way that I come off to people..does that make me deceitful?
I broke two of my fingers because I punched the freaking wall..I hate to be a wuss but it hurts so friggen bad.I want to hate him so much.He is the only person that can make me hate myself like this.
I wish I could fall..on a night like this..into your loving arms..

Alright,so I guess people are saying that I am "hanging out with Ian to piss Geoff off"..what..??I have hung out with about hmm..ONCE,and the LAST thing I want to do is make Geoff mad,gosh.Why would I try to piss him off if I'm trying to date him again?!Good Lord.You people are insane.

Ash
For just once..I would like to know that YOU care.

Okay..Leah and I are playing at The Day After Sunday..I am so flippin' nervous.Stew id letting us share a time slot with them and gosh..gosh.I LOVE YOU STEW AND MIKE!!I hope we don't embarass ourselves TOO bad.

Ash

HAPPY BIRTHDAY JOSHY!!!!i LOVE YOU CUZZY!!

So tonight..heh..I'm being such a loser..a little baby..I'm such a wuss!!

No boy is capable of making me cry..except you.

I've screwed up so much..now it's MY turn to try.

I Looooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooove........

Ash

When you say too much about anything important,it always ends up sounding more trivial than it is.Words thrash it.

I have thrashed about as much as I can and now all I can do is sit back and ponder all of the mistakes I made and all of the times I had chances to change myself and change the situations I developed..and live in regret until I can forget them.

What if I never get to feel that way again.

Happiness is impossible.

Ash

That is THE last time I listen to fortune cookies.THERE IS NO ANGRY MAN!!

Screw it.This whole situation sucks hard.

Ash

Simply put..I'm head over heels.Have a wonderful night kids.

Ash

Last night was wonderful.I went to Jessica's with a lot of people and it was Geoff's  birthday so I took him his present.We hung out for awhile and then Geoff and I went and laid in the road for about 2 hours talking.I saw my first shooting star with him:)..I wanted to cry.On nights like those I just don't see how he wouldn't want us to be together.Weeeeeeeeeell,I'm still here waiting for him.Maybe that's a mistake,but I don't care.

Epictetus:
         "In order to improve,be content to be thought foolish and stupid"

I will be the dumbest girl ever.

Ash

The Brilliant Dance 
So this is odd, the painful realization that all has gone wrong.  and nobody cares at all, and nobody cares at all.  So you buried all your lover's clothes and burned the letters lover wrote, but it doesn't make it any better.  does it make it any better? 
And the plaster dented from your fist in the hall where you had your first kiss reminds you that the memories will fade.
So this is strange, our sidestepping has come to be a brilliant dance where nobody leads at all, where nobody leads at all.
And the picture frames are facing down and the ringing from this empty sound is deafening and keeping you from sleep.
And breathing is a foreign task and thinking's just too much to ask and you're measuring your minutes by a clock that's blinking eights.
This is incredible,starving, insatiable, yes, this is love for the first time.
Well, you'd like to think that you were invincible.
Yeah, well weren't we all once before we felt loss for the first time.
Well this is the last time.


i'm reading your note over again.  there's not a word that i comprehend, except when you signed it "i will love you always and forever."  


Ash


I haven't given up..but I'm on the edge of my perception.

You know that kid on Malcolm in the Middle that's in the wheel chair?..I aspire to be like him.

Well,I lied.We went back out and broke up again..the day after my birthday.It was because I'm a jerk.Well,I guess I deserved it if I was being a jerk((but I didn't notice I was))..I am a dumb girl.Happy friggen Birthday to me.

Ash

Ohio is for lovers..too bad I don't live there.

Geoff and I broke up on Friday..pretty positive it's for good this time.I went to homecoming tonight and I suppose it was alright.It was pretty crappy and then Cory came and kinda lightened the mood.I went to Battle of the Bands on Thursday night with Leah and it was super.Jordan and Cory's band kicked some big booty.Divinci is spelled without an "H"..gosh.I heard Cory sing for the 1st((or 2nd?))time and he was fantastic.That night was fairly wonderful.Tonight was..tonight just was.

Ash


I've been pondering the Jordan Question and still haven't reached a conclusion..gooooooodness. 


LEE TAYLOR SIGNED MY SHOE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!:)

Party..raided..raped..wrong!Have a great day.

((There's something VERY wrong with this entry))

Ash

Alright..I know it's been long but I'm sure I wasn't missed all too much..but I'm back and ready to take up time.Well,Janell and Erin and I all went to the movies tonight and met a bunch of kids up there(we went to the new theater)and I thought i was going to piss my panties...The Grudge wasn't even all that scary..it just makes you jump.Gosh.Well,Geoff and I are pretty good I suppose...we have our moments.I'm going to a party tomorrow night which should be uhh....super.Marshal and Erin are supposed to meet for some strange reason...that should be..weird and awkward.Janell is getting a surprise but screw her cause she doesn't know what it is and EVERYONE ELSE DOES!!!MOOHEH HEH HEH..WELL ANYWAYS,okay I don't have much to say..COURTNEY!!!!WE NEED TO HANG OUT!Gosh..ok well I guess I'm gonna head on to beddy bie.Good night losers.

Ash
Why does the past matter so much?

OK.Geoff and I are going back out.I must say that was THE most pointless break up ever..I am a fool.Courtney,don't hate!Cause I love you!

Ash

Today....Geoff and I broke up...Lord knows why.I am stupid & miserable..GOSH!I hope I did the right thing.I Love Y'all..

Ash

Ok,prolly won't write in here for awhile..so yeah,I love everybody!Good luck with this whole storm thing.Talk to y'all soon.


J,Geoff,Erin,Courtney,Cory,Jordan,Janell,Leah,Dillon..& EVERYBODY I DIDN'T PUT..Love you!!

Ash

Ok,no time to write too much..Look up a Volkswagon Karmann Ghia and tell me whatchya think...that's the car i'm getting!:):):)yay..i went to look for a stupid dress this weekend for homecoming.It's pretty bad arse for bein a dress.I had a grrrrrrrrrrrreat weekend.I spent it mostly with Geoff because i'm not gonna be here next weekend.......so i won't see em for 2 whole weeks!!good Lord..ok,COURTNEY WE NEED TO HANG OUT SILLY GIRL!!but ok,i hafta go,I hope everyone has a gggggggggggggggggrrrrrrrrrrreeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaaatttttttttttt week..goodnight fellow biatches.

Ash

KAYLA IS MY TWIN!! I have pictures tomorrow..crappity crap crap crappy..that sucks. Ash

Ok,so this weekend was kinda eventful.But last night we(( me,my mommy,mark,and geoff ))all went to the bushwacker festival and we ate at Hooters.Our server was a pregnant Hooter's girl!Never seen ona them before.Oh,and we saw J and CORY!!Umm..Then we went to Dairy Queen and came home early.Geoff stayed the night at my house cause we got home late,and he kept me up till like 3 because we were talking.He is so sweet.Then he freakin woke me up at 8:30 and we went and got breakfast and then we came back and were lazy for the rest of the day.So yeah,well.I hope everyone had a cool-O weekend.La De Da..Eat peanut butter.

Ash

Ok,well,since I haven't written in this since school,here it is.I have English 2 honors 1st,Visions and Pursuits 2nd,Biology 1 honors 3rd,and Algebra 2 4th.Great schedule eh?Tip for all of you Freshmen...DO NOT DOUBLE UP!!iT SUCKS ASS!!..anyways,nothing exciting happened at school.Well,we had a Pep Rally today and everyone lost their voices from yelling "weiner and penis" (Mad..lmao..we are gay kids).Anyways,Jackie,Jake,and Geoff came over right after school and then Jackie left and Erin came over and we watched Eurotrip again and did boring crap.But I got to see Geoff!!!!So YAY!!..umm,so..How was everyone's first week of school?Lata bitches.

Ash

Tomorrow..is the last day of summer((like I need to remind you))=(..That sucks hard.And I need to find a ride home from school.If anyone is nice enough to take me,that would be great..but the chances of that are pretty slim.Have a good one kids.

Ash

Today I went clothes shopping.Then came home and Geoff,Jake,and Travis came over,then Jackie and Erin.Went to La Hacienda and Bealls.Came home and played video games and all hung out.Then played in the driveway.Fun Fun.But Geoff made me this cute little necklace!!And that made my day=)And ya know what else???I LOVE GEOFF!!And of course I love the rest of you,too!!

Ash

Goodie!!I have a picture now because Cortney is the greatest!...School starts soon,like I need to remind everyone.I got my hair cut,It's pretty short,I'm still debating on whether or not I like it..By the time I decide,it will be long again.Today was strange..and awkward...and scary..etcetcetc...but it all turned out well,so that's good.I miss my friends=(..I'm reading The Notebook..that was the best movie..goodness.Oh,sorry AGAIN about the pictures..I gotta learn how to do that right.

Ash

This is Geoff...  Oh My Goodness!!This is Geoff too!!...Ya know what..I'm gonna feel like a complete retard if this picture thing doesn't work this time.It better.But yeah,so today it's been a month since Geoff and I started dating.=)We hung out and it was G-R-E-A-T..He is just too perfect((and he makes me feel like a little Princess!))Goodness..Tomorrow((today))I get my hair cut..........I am reeeeeal worried as to how it's gonna turn out..hopefully not too bad considering we have yearbook pictures the 2nd week into school.That would suk if they turn out bad!!=(Oh well,crap happens to the best of us.=)

Ash

Ok Losers,sorry if the last thing didn't post all that well,I figured the picture thing wouldn't work because I'm a dumbass and don't know what I'm doing.Maybe I'll try again another day.But yeah,today was good.Geoff came over and we went to lunch and to wal-mart and goofed off for a lil bit.Then we came back here..and Oh My Goodness..The "L" word came out..uh oh.But yeah then I went to the beach with Erin and Dillon and we hung out and I got sick and it sucked.

Ash          

::I love Geoff!!::

Hey crazy kids..That's my little Geoffy!!Isn't he BeAuTiFuL?He is the coolest!!..Sorry I haven't posted in awhile...I didn't have much to say about my boring self..I went to Mississippi..and I've been hanging out with Geoff a lot.Umm..I suppose I'll write later!Have a good one..

Ash
Tonight was the BEST night of my life...
I HATE it when everything is going perfect..That means something very bad will happen soon and I am so not looking forward to whatever that thing may be.

Ok fine,No one wants to write in here?Okay then I won't either..

ash
I am SO happy..I wish this feeling would last forever..
Geoff and I started going out last night:):):)

^^sigh^^...Last night was THE best night ever...I got to hang out with Geoff ALL NIGHT!...He is the most awesome guy ever.We watched those dang Chucky movies..JOSH THEY ARE NOT SCARY AT ALL!!man,and I am scared of everything!..Joshy you are such a wimp son.But yeah,Jess is lookin for a good man..so anyone that feels like hangin out with a tall blonde babe(who is crazy as hell)then tell me:)..I feel bad starting a dating service through my journal but I suppose ya know,whatever works.But yeah,Geoff is GREAT!!He makes me so giddy:):)...*sigh*you kids have a good one..

ash

Dashboard-"So Impossible"

So she says,
"Everyone's going to the party
Won't you come if I come 
with a friend for your friend?
I'd be so pleased to see you
Out of the classroom,
Wearing the smile that I'll bring you.
I was hoping to learn a few things, like........
Do you do you like dishing the dirt 
On the whole class,
Talking the big smack, 
Or playing the fool?
Wearing all of the latest fashions
Or bucking the new trends?
Wearing your old threads
Or if you like coffee in the evening.
These are a few things,
That I'd like to know;
That I'd like to know."

So I say,
"I've been scheduled to work,
But I'll call in.
And, my friend isn't busy, 
He'd be happy to join me.
And maybe my friend and your friend 
Will hit it off?
Or, maybe we will?
I'm dying to know........
Do you, do you like dreaming 
Of things so impossible?
Or only the practical,
Or ever the wild?
Waiting through all of your 
Bad, bad days;
Just to end them 
With someone you care about?
But do you like making out,
And long drives and brown eyes 
And guys that just don't quite fit in?
"Do you like them?"

"So, yes,
I'll see you there."

***sigh***

DANIELLE IS A P.I.M.P.-CALL HER CAUSE SHE NEEDS SOME LOVIN'..EXCEPT FOR DAVID..UGLY PENIS.

ash

Just got home like an hour ago from my driving class.It is very boring,but it feels kinda good to wake up at 6 in the morning(as retarded as that sounds)because I don't feel like I've wasted half of the day sleeping..I wish we didn't hafta sleep.But yeah,Geoff has his driving test today so yeah,Good Luck on that.He is the coolest guy..sigh..well,maybe I'll write something else later.

ash

I just had to drive my brother all the way to his freaking camp thing and it's all the way the hell down Quintette and all..so boring.I have my driving class tomorrow and I'm gonna fail...great.Wish me luck on that I guess.Does anyone know about the next Day After Sunday?

ash

msudawg200:  they let you drive? blessin from God that youre still alive

Well today I was SUPPOSED to go to the movies with Erin,Jessica,Travis,and Geoff....but we didn't get to go.So everyone was going to come over,but only J,Erin,and Jess did.But I talked to Geoff for a little on the phone..he is such an awesome guy:)and hopefully we will actually get to do something Friday..but yeah,and then I got on here.I know I lead a VERY eventful life.............envy me.......ok just kidding.Yeah well,I'm tired as heck..goodnight.

ash*sigh*

Yesterday everyone came over and we played twister and.blahdiblahdiblah..but TODAY!!Everyone came over,*sigh*and Jessica introduced me to her VERY EXTREMELY HOT FRIEND..Geoff*sigh*...very cute,I really hope that we get to hang out some time...:) :) :)..but yeah,and Erin was all depressed because Josh isn't here,she cried all night and went psycho on a five year old we met on Cervantes,ok so maybe not,but I know she is sad that she can't see him:( and JACKIE!!That little hoe was all over ME!!She wants Dillon's hot and sexy b-o-d...and Jessica is in lust with J..and Dillon..but Jackie will not let her invade her castle!!(aka..Dillon)she will not let her rain on her parade!!she will not let her spill ketchup on her white pants!!ok yeah,you got the point..she is very posessive...:-D but I suppose I will tolerate her for awhile since she has no other friends..ok well,goodnight

ash

What must I put in this journal to get some sort of comment these days,huh?Gah,help me out!!I just watched that Ashlee Simpson show........................SHE IS SO GAY!!I'm glad her boyfriend broke up with her though cause she's stupid and he's really hot..not that that has much to do with it and that is pretty mean of me,but still.Okay I'm done being a teenie-bopper for tonight,so yeah..I did nothing today.Cool,I know right?Yeah so I was just thinking today about how cool it is to be alive(being the random and weird person that I am).I mean,I wasn't just thinking about "Yeah there's a lot of cool stuff to do here."but I was thinking about how awesome it is that out of the MILLION BAZILLION fetuses out there God picked me to be one that lives and not to mention lives in an awesome time period and with awesome people and I get to experience completely indescribable things and wow...I am high on life..What a great feeling..

ash

Okay,today was pretty boring.I went to the beach with Erin and Dillon and we played goofy gold and walked on the boardwalk.Then Dillon and I talked about pick up lines and tried to use them on each other...pretty gay right?I know..Tomorrow Erin and I are supposed to go see a movie with TC and Dustin,that should be great fun..well...goodnight
